articles.description: The star of period drama Ashes Of Love is the face of Bvlgari, L’Oreal, Roger Vivier, and the first male Asia-Pacific brand ambassador of Bally.
articles.content:
According to Chinese publication Jing Daily, LOreal and Roger Vivier have deleted social media posts featuring Deng. LOreal has also issued a statement cutting ties with the actor.

articles.title: Barbie Hsu's mother coming around to her sudden marriage, says Dee Hsu - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: According to younger sister Dee Hsu, their mum has concerns about Barbie Hsu's marriage as a mother but “there’s no way she can (stay mad) at her for long”.
articles.content: Barbie Hsus sudden marriage with former boyfriend DJ Koo Jun-yup took not only her fans but even her own mother by surprise, causing some friction between the mother-daughter duo. But it appears the … [+1884 chars]

articles.title: A first for Malaysia: Bukit Jalil’s Eat and Cook honoured by Asia’s 50 Best Restaurants with the 2022 American Express One To Watch Award - Malay Mail
articles.description: KUALA LUMPUR, March 15 — Restaurant Eat and Cook has been selected by the organisers of Asia’s 50 Best Restaurants to receive the much coveted American Express One To Watch Award. A first for a Malaysian restaurant, this award recognises Eat and Cook as a ris…
articles.content:
Diners at Eat and Cook can experience omakase with local tongues in an island kitchen setting. Picture courtesy of Asias 50 Best Restaurants
